description:
Enjoy this classic homestyle meal, even when you're far away from home.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, grilled seasoned chicken breast with rib meat (chicken breast with rib meat, salt, potato starch, onion and garlic powder, spice), peas, carrot, dehydrated potatoes, potato starch, modified milk ingredients, celery, parmesan cheese powder (parmesan cheese [partially skimmed milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), onion, milk ingredients, butter powder (butter, skim milk powder, sodium caseinate, disodium phosphate), onion, dried garlic, natural flavour, sea salt, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), chicken flavour broth mix (maltodextrin, salt, torula yeast, dehydrated vegetables, potato flour, xanthan gum, spices, spice extractives, soy lecithin), black pepper, thyme, bay leaves
  • Allergens - contains: milk and soy
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Homestyle Chicken Pot Pie
